title: Tough kid from Brooklyn | Little Lord Fauntleroy (1936) Freddie Bartholomew | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Tough kid from Brooklyn | Little Lord Fauntleroy (1936) Freddie Bartholomew | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A TOUGH KID FROM BROOKLYN STEPS OUT IN SOCIETY!  The story of a lovable and poor boy who turns out to be the last heir of a British fortune, and changes a tyrannous old man into a human being.

Original B&W version: Little Lord Fauntleroy (1936) https://youtu.be/ROHag1wxBQo
Director: John Cromwell
Stars: Freddie Bartholomew, Dolores Costello-Barrymore, C. Aubrey Smith & Mickey Rooney
Genres: Classics, Colorized, Drama, Family

This video is subtitled in more than 30 languages and dubbed in German & Spanish. Click on ⚙️ and choose audio tracks and/or subtitles
